attributes.action: get a well deserved Peerage before he leaves office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony (can we call you Tony?  We used to be able to), you have been a Prime Minister that will go down in history as being one of them.

No doubt you are looking forward to your retirement, we certainly are.

You deserve a Peerage for what bravery and fortitude you have shown against people who know better than you over matters like the NHS, Iraq and education.

Such detachment from voters deserves a seat in the House of Lords.

Kudos to you Tony, Kudos.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
